page.title: 08HOME LIFE - SAMANTHA
page.content: At half-past seven my alarm clock goes off. I usually switch my television on to make sure that the clock has not broken down, then I yawn and get up. My usual breakfast is Alpen with a glass of pure orange juice. Then I clean my teeth with my bear toothbrush and my face with my brother's motor-bike flannel, then I get dressed, wake my mum up (plus brother), grab my bag, run down stairs and smell the fresh air of a new day. The first thing that we do is read, then the assembly bell goes unless the radio is going. After that we usually do Maths followed by English then Geography and History (History and English are my favourite subjects). Then if we are really lucky and do not talk in class, we will be doing P.E. or Art (then with that the day's over at school).
